Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Cherokee
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A heavy duty transport aircraft, the Cherokee is a hulking monstrosity of aeronautical engineering. Very slow due to all the bulk, equally thirsty, and sports massive cargo capacity. Plan accordingly.

A dedicated transport helicopter with a modified cargo bay, it requires two pilots to operate and frequent refueling. However, nothing comes even close to bulk transportation at its tech level.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
